articles.title: Kim Jong Un Provides Field Guidance to Sinhung Machine Factory
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un Provides Field Guidance to Sinhung Machine Factory
						
 Pyongyang, June 29 (KCNA) -- Kim Jong Un, first secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea, first chairman of the National Defence Commission of the DPRK and supreme commander of the Korean People's Army, provided field guidance to the Sinhung Machine Factory.
					 He looked round the room dedicated to the education in the revolutionary history.
					
					 Watching the data and relics on display, he looked back with deep emotion upon the immortal leadership exploits of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il associated with the factory.
					
					 Going round various places including the assembling and processing shops, he learnt in detail about the production and modernization of equipment.
					
					 At the assembling shop he was very pleased to see the shop full of machines.
					
					 He had machines operated to learn about their performance and effectiveness.
					
					 At the processing shop he acquainted himself with the operation and modernization of equipment.
					
					 Looking round machine accessory and tool stores, he said that making such full preparations is important for keeping production going at a high rate.
					
					 After learning in detail about the CNC-based equipment, he said that there is a sharp difference between updated and old equipment in performance, appearance and operation.
					
					 Noting that the factory is of a great significance in developing the country's machine-building industry, he set forth tasks to be fulfilled by the factory.
					
					 Underling the need for the factory to keep the production going at a high rate and fulfill its plan without fail, he said that the related units should send quality steel and high-performance cooperative products in time.
					
					 He said the factory should produce world-level machinery good in use and suitable to the actual conditions of the country.
					
					 With competent technicians, workers strong in the revolutionary spirit and solid foundation, the factory should decisively improve the existing standard in the development and production of machinery, he said. 
					
					 The factory should make efforts to manufacture multi-purpose and multi-function machines surpassing the world's advanced ones in performance and technical specification and to base the production on locally available materials, he added.
					
					 Saying that if the factory updates the equipment, it can save manpower and enhance the production capacity and quality of the products, he took measures necessary for the modernization of equipment.
					
					 Expressing expectation that the employees of the factory would register bigger successes in the production, he had a photo session with them. 
					
					 He was accompanied by Choe Ryong Hae, Pak Thae Song, Hwang Pyong So, Hong Yong Chil, Yun Tong Hyon, Pak Jong Chon and Ju To Hyon.

articles.title: S. Korean Authorities Warned against Projected Leaflet Scattering Operation
articles.content:
S. Korean Authorities Warned against Projected Leaflet Scattering Operation 
 Pyongyang, June 29 (KCNA) -- The Command of the Korean People's Army in the Western Sector of the Front issued the following press release on Saturday:
					 The present puppet authorities of south Korea are mulling hurling human scum affiliated to "the Alliance for the Movement of Free North", an organization of die-hard defectors from the north, into a leaflet scattering operation against the DPRK from Rimjin Pavilion in Paju City, Kyonggi Province in the western sector of the front on June 29.
					
					 The chief of this alliance openly blustered that it would scatter as planned more than 200 000 leaflets daring hurt the dignity of the DPRK, its social system and taking issue with its "human rights performance". This reminds one of a puppy knowing no fear of a tiger.
					
					 It was reported that even riffraffs of the "International Human Rights Foundation" in the U.S. would be involved in that operation.
					
					 The prevailing situation indicates that the present authorities of south Korea have begun escalating again their confrontation with the DPRK in collusion with the U.S.
					
					 Recently the Park Geun Hye regime deliberately aborted the hard-won inter-Korean authorities talks. In the wake of this action, it showed such insolent behavior as fully opening the minutes of the north-south summit to public in a bid to push the inter-Korean relations to a catastrophe. Moreover, it is introducing U.S. war hardware including a formation of B-52 nuclear strategic bombers into south Korea, another provocation to the DPRK.
					
					  The planned leaflet-scattering operation is part of its premeditated and deliberate confrontation racket against the DPRK aimed to escalate such provocation.
					
					 The U.S. and the present puppet authorities of south Korea should not forget even a moment that the Rimjin Pavilion is within the range of direct sighting strike of the units under the above-said command of the KPA.
					
					 On various occasions, including the special statement issued by the Ministry of People's Security of the DPRK on June 19, the DPRK has served warnings strong enough for the U.S. and the Park group to understand of their wicked attitude as they are kicking up a frantic racket against the DPRK by hurling these riffraffs including vicious deserters from the north. 
					
					 Given that these human scum have rushed of their own accord to become targets of strikes to be made by the KPA ready to mete out physical punishment,  it is our stand to show these provocateurs what miserable fate they will face.
					
					 In case the projected leaflet scattering operation will push the present situation to a grave phase, the U.S. and Park group will be held wholly accountable for it as they have hurled these human scum into such provocation.

articles.title: Greetings to Sudanese President
articles.content:
Greetings to Sudanese President
 Pyongyang, June 29 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the DPRK Supreme People's Assembly, Saturday sent a message of greeting to Omar Hassan Ahmed Al-Bashir, president of Sudan, on the occasion of the 24th anniversary of the revolution in Sudan.
					 The message sincerely wished the president and people of Sudan greater success in their work for the stability and development of the country and expressed belief that the friendly and cooperative relations between the two countries would grow stronger.

articles.title: Greetings to Emir of States of Qatar
articles.content:
Greetings to Emir of States of Qatar
 Pyongyang, June 29 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the DPRK Supreme People's Assembly, Friday sent a message of greeting to Tamim bin Hamad al-Thani, who acceded to the throne of emir of States of Qatar. 
					 Kim Yong Nam sincerely wished the emir big success in his responsible work for development and prosperity of the country in the future, expressing belief that the good relations of friendship and cooperation between the two countries would grow stronger.

articles.title: DPRK Premier Makes Field Survey of Various Sectors in North Phyongan Province
articles.content:
DPRK Premier Makes Field Survey of Various Sectors in North Phyongan Province
						
 Pyongyang, June 29 (KCNA) -- DPRK Premier Pak Pong Ju made field survey of various sectors in North Phyongan Province.
					 The premier looked round various production processes at the Ponghwa Chemical Factory and the Ryangchaek Bearing Factory to learn about technological equipment at work. He encouraged the workers there in their drive to improve the management of equipment and technical control.
					
					 He learned about the technical specification of a new traveling rice thrasher at the Naejung Cooperative Farm in Yomju County and acquainted himself with issues arising in applying the system for taking charge of plots while talking with farmers.
					
					 Consultative meetings of officials concerned took place at relevant units.
					
					 They discussed measures for providing in good time fuel and materials badly needed in production and improving the quality of products.
					
					 They also dealt with issues of increasing the utility rate of land to suit specific conditions and boosting the will of the agricultural workers to increase production.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un Receives Congratulatory Message from Mexican Party Leader
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un Receives Congratulatory Message from Mexican Party Leader
						
 Pyongyang, June 29 (KCNA) -- Kim Jong Un, first secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea, on June 17 received a congratulatory message from Alberto Anaya Gutierrez, national leader of the Workers' Party of Mexico.
					 The message paid highest tribute to leader Kim Jong Il on behalf of all the party members of the Workers' Party of Mexico and its national leader on the occasion of June 19, the 49th anniversary of Kim Jong Il's start of work at the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea.
					
					 The undying feats Kim Jong Il performed will shine long in human history as he devoted his whole life to triumphantly leading the revolutionary cause of Juche pioneered by President Kim Il Sung, defending the peace and stability in the Korean Peninsula and East Asia and victoriously advancing the world socialist cause, it noted.
					
					 It most sincerely wished Kim Jong Un great success in his noble work of wisely leading the struggle of the WPK and the Korean people to achieve the final victory of the revolutionary cause of Juche and the cause of global independence.

articles.title: DPRK Delegation Leaves
articles.content:
DPRK Delegation Leaves
						
 Pyongyang, June 29 (KCNA) -- A DPRK delegation led by Foreign Minister Pak Ui Chun left here Saturday to take part in the ministerial meeting of the ASEAN Regional Forum to be held in Brunei Darussalam and visit it.

articles.title: More Mass Rallies Held in DPRK
articles.content:
More Mass Rallies Held in DPRK
						
 Pyongyang, June 29 (KCNA) -- Mass rallies took place in Jagang Province and Rason City on Saturday on the occasion of June 25, the day of struggle against U.S. imperialism.
					 Present there were senior officials of the local party and power bodies and working people's organizations, officials and other people of industrial establishments and cooperative farms and teachers and students of universities and colleges.
					
					 At the rallies speakers bitterly denounced the U.S. imperialists for igniting a brigandish war for aggression against the northern half of Korea and committing the most brutal and unethical crimes during the war with more than 2 million troops and huge quantities of combat and technical equipment involved.
					
					 They went on:
					
					 The army and the people of the DPRK rallied close around President Kim Il Sung inflicted a shameful defeat upon the aggressors, bringing about the beginning of decline for the U.S. imperialists.
					
					 Far from drawing a lesson taught by history, the U.S. imperialists have posed a serious threat to the sovereignty of the DPRK and the supreme interests of the country. The nature of the U.S. imperialist aggressors as the chieftain of aggression and war remains unchanged no matte how much water may flow under the bridge.
					
					 If the U.S. imperialists and the south Korean puppet warmongers ignite a war at any cost, the army and people of the DPRK will turn out as one in all-people resistance, wipe out them to the last man by powerful retaliatory means and drop the curtain on the centuries-old history of confrontation with the U.S.
					
					 They called for glorifying this significant year with greater labor successes and achieving a final victory in the anti-U.S. sacred war, true to the Songun revolutionary leadership of the dear respected Kim Jong Un.
					
					 At the end of the rallies their participants staged demonstrations.

articles.title: Pyongyangites Enjoy Unhasu Concert
articles.content:
Pyongyangites Enjoy Unhasu Concert
 Pyongyang, June 29 (KCNA) -- The Unhasu concert dropped its curtain at the People's Theater Saturday. It was given on the occasion of June 25, the day of struggle against U.S. imperialism. 
					 Enjoying it were youth, students and working people in Pyongyang. 
					
					 Put on the stage were such numbers as female solo and pangchang "Fly High, Doves", mixed quartet "Song of New Spring", mixed chorus "Song of the Proclamation of the People's Republic" and instrumental music.
					
					 The repertoire included music of theme songs "War Scenario of U.S. Imperialists" which indict them for igniting the war of aggression against the peaceful DPRK.
					
					 Mixed chorus "Song of National Defence," orchestra "Mungyong Pass" and other pieces helped the audience recollect that brave servicepersons of the Korean People's Army and people defended the country and powerfully demonstrated the dignity and spirit of the nation by displaying popular heroism and the matchless self-sacrificing spirit under the leadership of the great Generalissimo Kim Il Sung.
					
					 Story-telling and orchestra "Nukes and Peace" resounded through the hall, leading the concert to its climax.
					
					 The concert helped the audience harden the belief that the army and people of the DPRK will wipe out the U.S. imperialist aggressors and surely bring the historic event of national reunification, united close around the dear respected Kim Jong Un, if the final death-defying battle against them comes.

articles.title: Historic Kalun Meeting
articles.content:
Historic Kalun Meeting
						
 Pyongyang, June 29 (KCNA) -- In his teens, President Kim Il Sung created the Juche idea when the Korean revolution was groping for a new idea in the struggle against the Japanese invaders.
					 Since then, the idea has served as guiding idea in the era of independence. 
					
					 He decided that in order to work out a correct guiding theory suited to the Korean situation it was necessary to take an independent view of all issues and settle them in an original way suited to the actual conditions of Korea, instead of holding classic works or the experiences of other countries supreme.
					
					 Hence, he convened a meeting of leading officials of the Young Communist League and the Anti-imperialist Youth League in Kalun from June 30 to July 2, Juche 19 (1930), at which he made a report entitled "The Path of the Korean Revolution".
					
					 In the report he elucidated an idea that the master of the Korean revolution is the Korean people themselves and, therefore, the Korean revolution should be made by the efforts of the Korean people.
					
					 The character and tasks of the Korean revolution and the policies of launching an anti-Japanese armed struggle, forming the anti-Japanese national united front and founding a party, advanced at the meeting, were all derived from the Juche idea.
					
					 The idea has proved its validity in the whole course of the Korean revolution.
					
					 Guided by the Juche idea, the Democratic People's Republic of Korea has firmly maintained independence in politics, self-support in the economy and self-reliance in national defense, without vacillation under any vortex of world's situation.
					
					 Now the DPRK is making headway along the road of Songun (military-first) under the seasoned leadership of the dear respected Kim Jong Un with the Juche idea as its guiding idea.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Slams S. Korean Authorities for Opening to Public Minutes of North-South Summit
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Slams S. Korean Authorities for Opening to Public Minutes of North-South Summit
						
 Pyongyang, June 29 (KCNA) -- Some days ago, the south Korean puppet Intelligence Service (IS) opened to the public the minutes of the 2007 north-south summit all of a sudden, in conspiracy with the group of "Saenuri Party." The group claims that during the summit former president Roh Moo Hyun made remarks giving up the control over the "northern limit line" in the West Sea.
					 Rodong Sinmun Saturday observes in a bylined commentary in this regard:
					
					 This is an act of extreme political gangsterism prompted by an attempt to bring under control the worst ruling crisis and ensure ruling security.
					
					 The south Korean puppet group is loudly insisting on the bogus "northern limit line" which no one recognizes. More intolerable is that it uses the inter-Korean summit as a means for meeting its party interests and strategy and political greed.
					
					 The puppet conservative group has sought to open to the public the minutes of the summit in a bid to overcome unfavorable phase which it faced since the days of the past "presidential election." It now finds itself in the abyss of ruin through the recent disclosure of the unheard-of seizure of "power" caused by the case of the IS's interference in the "presidential election." That is why it opened the minutes to the public in a bid to divert elsewhere the public attention.
					
					 The recent case brought into bolder relief the wretched true colors of the puppet ruling forces who are working hard to overcome the political crisis and find a way out in hurting the dignity of the supreme leadership of the DPRK. The puppet group is making a mockery of the inter-Korean summit, using it as a plaything for attaining its sinister political purpose. Herein lies its dirty nature.
					
					 The present south Korean chief executive is apparently behind the case.
					
					 The development proves that the revelation of the minutes was a deliberate and premeditated act aimed to bring under control the worst political crisis and plunge the inter-Korean relations into catastrophe.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Calls for Establishing New International Order
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Calls for Establishing New International Order
						
 Pyongyang, June 29 (KCNA) -- It is an urgent demand at the present times which brooks no further delay to put an end to the old international order and establish new and fair international relations and order, says Rodong Sinmun Saturday in a bylined article.
					 It goes on: There have taken place tragic developments in the international arena in recent years in which dignity and sovereignty of different countries were ruthlessly trampled down by the imperialist forces. This is attributable to the unequal world political structure in which the imperialists rule the roost.
					
					 The world politics has been decided by nuclear powers since nuclear weapons appeared on the globe. The U.S. has used such unfair political structure as a lever to dominate the world not only in the Cold War era but after its demise. It is the scenario of the U.S. to put the world under its control, containing other nuclear powers through arms race, advantageous economic potential, etc.
					
					 The U.S. often calls for "ensuring peace and security" but it is aimed to cover up its ambition for domination and maintain the unfair and unequal world political structure and international order.
					
					 The U.S. is seized with brigandish mode of thinking that its will precisely means "law" governing the world and any country behaving contrary to this "law" is liable to become a target of its military strike. This is the height of arrogance.
					
					 If a specified country is allowed to act as if it were entitled to dominate the world in breach of international law, usage and principle, it is impossible to establish a fair international order and lifestyle governed by the jungle law will prevail in international relations, truth will be ruthlessly trampled down and, finally, the world will turn into a lawless one.
					
					 The DPRK will make every possible effort in the future to establish the fair international relations and order as a member of the international community.

articles.title: Japanese Politician's "Human Rights" Ballad Derided
articles.content:
Japanese Politician's "Human Rights" Ballad Derided
						
 Pyongyang, June 29 (KCNA) -- Japanese Ambassador for human rights and humanitarianism Ueda, addressing the recent session of the UN Commission against Torture in Geneva, said Japan is one of the most developed countries in the field of human rights only to provoke a big laughter in the meeting hall. Ueda got in a temper, turning red, asking what is funny.
					 Rodong Sinmun Saturday observes in a bylined commentary in this regard:
					
					 If Ueda had a normal thinking power, he would not have found fault with the participants in the meeting but reflected on how he behaved.
					
					 Japanese politicians are letting loose a spate of reckless remarks out of the twisted outlook on ethnics and history. 
					
					 If the Japanese reactionaries respect dignity and right of human beings, they should stop reeling off "human rights" ballad in the UN.
					
					 Ridiculous is that Japan is kicking off "human rights" rackets against other countries in the UN and other international arena while not reflecting on its past heinous crimes against humanity.
					
					 It is preposterous for Japan to take issue with others over things which pose no problem while pushing under the carpet its own human rights abuses.
					
					 No country in the world is more shameless and morally vulgar than Japan. It is natural that Japanese reactionaries' demeanor invites international denunciation. They would be well advised to bear in mind that the more loudly they trumpet about "human rights" in international arena, the bigger shame they will meet.

articles.title: Minju Joson Denounces S. Korean Warmongers for Moving to Cover up Truth of Korean War
articles.content:
Minju Joson Denounces S. Korean Warmongers for Moving to Cover up Truth of Korean War
						
 Pyongyang, June 29 (KCNA) -- The south Korean puppet forces staged the anti-DPRK burlesques in different parts of south Korea on June 25. On the same day, the puppet Decoration Agency held a "ceremony for commemorating the June 25 war" with the attendance of puppet forces and foreign hirelings who took part in the Korean War and many citizens at the Jamsil Gymnasium in Seoul.
					 Minju Joson Saturday says in a bylined commentary in this regard:
					
					 Such an action is no more than a criminal move to describe the defeat in the Korean War as a "victory" and to cover up the nature of a war provocateur under the pretext of the "commemoration".
					
					 What should not be overlooked is that the puppet forces inveigled in the anti-DPRK burlesques even diplomats of those countries which sent hirelings to the Korean War and foreign mercenaries who took part in the war as U.S. cannon fodder.
					
					 Their sinister intention is to draw the U.S. and its satellite forces to the burlesques as they did during the past war and thus ignite the second Korean war.
					
					 The U.S. and the puppet group should stop going reckless, mindful that July 27, the day of victory, immediately followed June 25.
					
					 If the U.S. and the puppet forces again ignite a war for aggression on this land, the army and the people of the DPRK will give vent to their pent-up resentment and revenge and mercilessly wipe out the aggressors and provocateurs so as to achieve the victory in the sacred war for the country's reunification.

articles.title: KCNA Commentary Urges U.S. to Have Proper Approach towards Nuclear Issue in Korea
articles.content:
KCNA Commentary Urges U.S. to Have Proper Approach towards Nuclear Issue in Korea
						
 Pyongyang, June 29 (KCNA) -- The U.S. unreasonable policy toward the DPRK is still blocking a solution to the nuclear issue on the Korean Peninsula. 
					 The U.S. Department of Defense in a recent "strategic report on nuclear operation" asserted that it can never recognize the validity of north Korea's pursuance of its nuclear weapons.
					
					 Almost at the same time, the man nominated as assistant secretary of State for East Asian and Pacific Affairs, at a meeting of the Senate Foreign Relations Committee, accused the DPRK of seeking unnecessary military capability to cope with imaginary threat. He cried out for actively promoting "verifiable" denuclearization of the Korean Peninsula and making positive efforts to check the DPRK's proliferation efforts and threat from its neighboring countries.
					
					 This is an impudent provocation of the U.S. as it makes profound confusion of right and wrong to create impression that the DPRK is to blame for the tensions on the Korean Peninsula.
					
					 The U.S. hostile policy toward the DPRK and huge armed forces supporting the policy are the greatest threat to the peace and security of the peninsula.
					
					 As a matter of fact, the U.S. provocation and threat of a nuclear war against the DPRK are persistent, potential and outrageous as they are several decades old.
					
					 It is none other than the U.S. which introduced nuclear weapons into the Korean Peninsula for the first time, turned south Korea into the world's biggest nuclear arsenal and staged madcap nuclear war exercises to invade the DPRK for several decades.
					
					 It is again the U.S. which undisguisedly revealed its sinister intention to mount a nuclear attack on the DPRK through trumpeting about "preemptive nuclear attack", "nuclear posture review" and "extended deterrence." It worked out a scenario for nuclear attack, staging war exercises under the simulated conditions of a real war, pursuant to operational plans for carrying out it. 
					
					 After the end of the Cold War, the nuclear powers decided to reduce nuclear weapons, but the U.S. has brandished its nuclear stick against the DPRK more desperately.
					
					 The U.S. administration branded the satellite launch of the DPRK for peaceful purposes recognized by international law as "long-range missile launch," kicking up a nuclear racket against it and making the nuclear issue of the Korean Peninsula more acute.
					
					 The reality eloquently proves how just the DPRK was when it took the action of having access to nuclear deterrent for self-defence to cope with the U.S. nuclear threat.
					
					 The DPRK's nuclear policy is consistent whether the U.S. recognizes it or not.
					
					 If peace and stability are to settle on this land, it is necessary to put an end to the U.S. nuclear war moves, first of all. There can be no denuclearization of the peninsula without this process. This is truth proven by the more than half a century long-history.
					
					 The DPRK's access to nuclear deterrent is a legitimate exercise of the right to self-defense as it reflects a bitter historical lesson and reality in which its sincere efforts for the denuclearization of the peninsula have been disregarded and the U.S. nuclear threat to the DPRK has increased day by day.
					
					 The denuclearization of the peninsula without the defusing of the U.S. threat is meaningless and it can never be realized.
					
					 The U.S. is foolishly claiming that it can negotiate with the DPRK when it takes measures for denuclearization, first of all, though it is letting nuclear bombers fly. This behavior cannot but cause a vicious cycle of tensions.
					
					 The U.S. should stop its nuclear threat and blackmail against the DPRK and halt all forms of provocations including "sanctions" before urging it to show its sincere will for denuclearization first.
					
					 The U.S. provocative nuclear racket against the DPRK will only end in destruction and Washington will be its greatest victim.
					
					 Its proper approach towards the nuclear issue on the peninsula would give a solution to the issue.

articles.title: S. Korean IS's Surveillance on Students Slammed
articles.content:
S. Korean IS's Surveillance on Students Slammed
						
 Pyongyang, June 29 (KCNA) -- The south Korean paper Hangyore reported that persons concerned and students of Inha University on June 26 laid bare the crimes the Intelligence Service (IS) has perpetrated by controlling and watching the tendency at the university.
					 The paper said:
					
					 Shortly ago, a staff member of the IS made a phone call on the university, asking if there was no particular movement inside the university as there are a lot of moves at universities in Seoul to issue declarations on the situation. Coming under strong fire by students, the agent of the IS excused himself, uttering that he did not ask about the tendency of students.
					
					 In this connection, human rights jurists' associations under 17 postgraduate courses for law across south Korea including Inha, Seoul, Konguk, Jeju and Jeonnam universities issued a joint statement demanding the chief executive own responsibility for the organized watch by the power organ and probe the truth about the action.

articles.title: S. Korean Authorities' Crackdown upon South Headquarters of Pomminryon under Fire
articles.content:
S. Korean Authorities' Crackdown upon South Headquarters of Pomminryon under Fire
 Pyongyang, June 29 (KCNA) -- Civic and social organizations of south Korea including the South Headquarters of the Pan-national Alliance for Korea's Reunification, the People's Solidarity for the Repeal of the "Security Law," the People's Strength for New Society and the Progress for Solidarity held a press conference outside the Anti-communist Branch Office in Hongje-dong, Seoul on June 26.
					 A press release was read out at the conference.
					
					 It said:
					
					 On the same day, the Intelligence Service (IS) and the Police Agency searched houses and offices of members of the organization including Kim Ul Su, acting chairman of the South Headquarters of Pomminryon, and arrested its two leading members.
					
					  This action is a typical suppression by the security authorities as they invoked the anachronistic "Security Law" in a bid to evade the blame for having brought the inter-Korean relations to a collapse and tone down the anger of the people which was touched off by the IS's interference in the election.
					
					 We vehemently denounce the present "government" and security authorities for cracking down upon the headquarters, a pro-reunification movement organization, which has supported the exchange and cooperation and implementation of the joint declaration between the south and the north, not content with their acts of negating the June 15 joint declaration and the October 4 declaration and bedeviling the inter-Korean relations.
					
					 The civic and social organizations will never pardon the moves of the authorities to weather their crisis through crackdown, the press release declared, calling for dynamic actions to have the SL, the law against democracy, human rights and reunification, abolished and the repressive machines dismantled.

articles.title: Dismantlement of IS Demanded in S. Korea
articles.content:
Dismantlement of IS Demanded in S. Korea
						
 Pyongyang, June 29 (KCNA) -- The Solidarity for Democracy, People's Life, Peaceful Reunification and Sovereignty of south Korea made public a statement demanding the dismantlement of the puppet Intelligence Service (IS) on June 26.
					 It is a hideous crime that the IS interfered in the "presidential election" by spreading rumor by abusing power, the statement said, and went on:
					
					 In order to calm down the angry people the IS in collusion with the "Saenuri Party" fully opened the minutes of the south-north summit, sparking off a chaos, the first of its kind in history.
					
					 In a word, the IS, a group of criminals, is nothing but a machine blocking the reunification of the country.
					
					 Such criminal group making no scruple of abusing human rights as a shock brigade for reviving "yusin" dictatorship should be disbanded.
					
					 The chief executive is evading the responsibility for the case. But, she should be held entirely responsible for it as there is increasing evidence proving that the then leading members of the election campaign were involved in the IS's interference in the election. 
					
					 The people will never stop their protest actions unless the chief executive owns due responsibility for it.

articles.title: Campaign for Publishing Declarations on Situation Gains in Scope and Strength in S. Korea
articles.content:
Campaign for Publishing Declarations on Situation Gains in Scope in S. Korea
						
 Pyongyang, June 29 (KCNA) -- A campaign of professors of south Korean universities for publishing declarations on the situation is rapidly gaining in scope and strength across south Korea in protest against the Intelligence Service's rash action of fully opening the minuets of the north-south summit to public.
					 Professors of Chongju University and Chungnam University on June 27 published declarations on the situation denouncing the puppet group's reckless action in the wake of the publication of such declaration by professors of Hanyang University, Sungkyunkwan University and Catholic University.
					
					 Professors of Chongju University termed the sudden opening of the minutes to public is a base act aimed to divert elsewhere public condemnation of the case of the IS's interference in the election.
					
					 It has been disclosed that the IS had interfered in elections, not abandoning the bad habit dating back to the military regime, they said, strongly protesting against these actions.
					
					 They charged that the IS spoke for the interests of the particular party and conducted propaganda by abusing power and thus distorted the will of the people.
					
					 Professors of Chungnam University condemned the IS for unhesitatingly pursuing illegal politics such as destruction of evidence, hindrance to investigation and opening to public of the minutes of the summit, a confidential document, not content with seriously violating democracy. They went on:
					
					 The present chief executive keeps mum about this action. This cannot be construed otherwise than her intention to connive at and patronize the IS's actions. She should be held responsible for the case of the IS.
					
					 Meanwhile, professors of Seoul National University, Dongguk University, Chungang University, Konkuk University and Jeonnam National University are going to publish declarations on the situation, terming the opening of the minutes an act of adding fuel to the fire, towering resentment of the people.
					
					 A professor of Chongju University said professors of the university are discussing a motion calling for dissolving the IS.

articles.title: June Issue of Magazine Paektu-Halla Published
articles.content:
June Issue of Magazine Paektu-Halla Published
						
 Pyongyang, June 29 (KCNA) -- The General Association of Koreans in China issued the June issue of its magazine Paektu-Halla.
					 The magazine carried a photo of the dear respected Marshal Kim Jong Un meeting with creators and artistes of the Unhasu Orchestra.
					
					 It highlighted news that he gave field guidance to the newly built machine plant managed by Kang Thae Ho.
					
					 It also conveyed news that his special envoy visited China.
					
					 It carried articles titled "The general and CNC (12)" and "Those days of hard-fought war" and articles contributed by Koreans in China under titles "Under care of benevolent Homeland", "Let us travel space aboard satellites" and "We will carry forward June 15 era of reunification".
					
					 It deals with news that the federation held round-table talks and issued a statement in support of the proposal for holding events common to the nation for marking the 13th anniversary of the June 15 joint declaration, a spokesman for the General Bureau for Central Guidance to the Development of the Special Zone gave an answer to the question raised by KCNA in which it noted that the prospects of the Kaesong Industrial Zone and the inter-Korean relations entirely depend on the attitude of the south side authorities. The magazine also contains commentaries captioned "Don't defame sacred soul of the heroic Kwangju popular uprisers" and "Chongwadae spokesperson, illegitimate child".
					
					 Seen in the magazine is news from the homeland that DPRK student Paek Sun Mi placed first in the Third International Art Olympics, Kim Hyok Bong and Kim Jong won gold medals at the 52nd World Table Tennis Championship and the Pyongyang Spring International Trade Fair was held with larger attendance.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il Praised in African Countries
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il Praised in African Countries 
						
 Pyongyang, June 29 (KCNA) -- A meeting took place in Uganda, lectures in Democratic Congo and Guinea and round-table talks in Ethiopia from June 14 to 19 to mark the 49th anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il's start of work at the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea. 
					 The deputy general secretary of the Central Committee of the Communist Party of Democratic Congo in a lecture said:
					
					 Working at the C.C., WPK Kim Jong Il made the party an integral whole in terms of ideology and organization and a body that has achieved unity in action. 
					
					 Under his wise leadership the WPK could solve all the problems in the revolution and construction with its own judgment and opinion as required by the situation of the country and aspiration of its people. 
					
					 The dear respected Marshal Kim Jong Un has seen to it that the WPK invariably preserved the idea of believing in the people as in Heaven which Kim Jong Il applied during the whole period of his leadership over the party as the main principle of the party work and activities. 
					
					 A Guinean personage and other speakers said that thanks to the outstanding leadership of Kim Jong Il the WPK could be the most tested and militant party. They praised him as the peerless politician.
					
					 Officials of the Ethiopian Gabriel Hospital and other units said that Kim Jong Il who opened the June 15 era of reunification is a great man who provided a turning phase in accomplishing the cause of Korea's reunification.

articles.title: Korean People's War Victory Day to Be Marked in Egypt
articles.content:
Korean People's War Victory Day to Be Marked in Egypt
						
 Pyongyang, June 29 (KCNA) -- An Egyptian preparatory committee for celebrating the 60th anniversary of the Korean people's victory in the great Fatherland Liberation War was inaugurated in Cairo on June 23.
					 Yehia Zakaria Khairullah, vice-chairman of the Socialist Freedom Party of Egypt, was elected chairman of the preparatory committee.
					
					 The committee decided to hold diverse political and cultural events in the period between July 1 and 30.

articles.title: Korean People's War Victory Day Marked in Austria, Ethiopia
articles.content:
Korean People's War Victory Day Marked in Austria, Ethiopia 
						
 Pyongyang, June 29 (KCNA) -- A meeting took place in Austria and seminars in Ethiopia between June 10 and 22 to mark the 60th anniversary of the victory of the Korean people in the great Fatherland Liberation War. 
					 The chairman of the Austrian preparatory committee for celebrating the 60th anniversary of the war victory day and other speakers said that under the wise guidance of President Kim Il Sung, invincible and iron-willed commander, the Korean people won the great victory in the Fatherland Liberation War and defeated the U.S. imperialists who ignited the war with the ambition for world domination. 
					
					 Denouncing the U.S. for openly conducting aggressions in different parts of the country to stifle the DPRK and other independent countries standing against imperialism, they expressed full support for the Korean people in their efforts to build a thriving socialist nation under the leadership of the dear respected Kim Jong Un. 
					
					 The chairman of the Ethiopian Youth Study Group of the Juche Idea and other speakers elaborated on the undying exploits performed by the President for the war victory. 
					
					 A message of greeting to Kim Jong Un was adopted at the meeting held in Austria.

articles.title: Withdrawal of U.S. Troops from S. Korea Demanded by Romanian
articles.content:
Withdrawal of U.S. Troops from S. Korea Demanded by Romanian 
						
 Pyongyang, June 29 (KCNA) -- Vasile Orleanu, chairman of the Supreme Council of the Socialist Party of Romania, issued a statement on June 25 on the occasion of June 25-July 27 month of anti-U.S. joint struggle.
					 He said as follows:
					
					 The heroic Korean people displayed bravery and the spirit of self-sacrifice in the war against the imperialist allied forces, upholding the outstanding military strategic idea and leadership of President Kim Il Sung, and thus defended the country.
					
					 On July 27, 1953 the DPRK defeated the U.S. which boasted of being the "strongest" in the world, bringing about the beginning of decline for the U.S. imperialists.
					
					 Far from drawing a lesson from the past shameful defeat, the U.S. has persistently pursued its policy of aggression and threats against the DPRK to again ignite a war.
					
					 If a war breaks out on the Korean Peninsula, it will turn into a nuclear war, plunging mankind into a horrible nuclear holocaust. The U.S. should clearly know it.
					
					 The Korean people are no longer the people of a young country as in decades ago.
					
					 The DPRK is fully displaying its might as a power possessed of the update nuclear weapons and space technology under the wise leadership of the great leaders.
					
					 Mindful that the provocation against the DPRK will only move up the day of self-destruction, the U.S. should replace the Armistice Agreement with a durable peace treaty and immediately pull all its aggression troops out the Korean Peninsula.
					
					 The Supreme Council of the Socialist Party of Romania wholeheartedly hopes that the Korean people will register signal successes in carrying out the new line laid down by the dear respected Kim Jong Un on simultaneously pushing forward economic construction and the building of nuclear force and achieve the historic cause of national reunification as soon as possible.
					
					 The ever-victorious history of the Korean people will continue.

articles.title: Dismantlement of "UN Forces Command" in S. Korea Demanded Abroad
articles.content:
Dismantlement of "UN Forces Command" in S. Korea Demanded Abroad
						
 Pyongyang, June 29 (KCNA) -- Political parties, organizations and personages of various countries released statements in succession supporting the DPRK's proposal for dismantling the "UN Forces Command" in south Korea at an early date and replacing the Armistice Agreement with a peace treaty.
					 The Peruvian Committee for Remembering Generalissimo Kim Jong Il noted the U.S. has not dismantled the "UN Forces Command" decades after the signing of the armistice agreement whose true intention is to justify its forces' permanent presence in south Korea.
					
					 The Socialist Party of Benin said for the U.S whether to keep the command or not is a matter of whether to have a tool for a war in the Asia-Pacific region, the biggest hotspot in the world, or not.
					
					 The Switzerland-Korea Committee and the Swiss Group for the Study of the Juche Idea said the U.S. recently moves to revive the function of the "UN Forces Command". Lurking behind this is its strategic calculation to seize south Korea as an advanced base for dominating the Asia-Pacific region, it added.
					
					 The Bulgaria-Korea Friendship Association condemned the U.S. for its recent move to turn the "UN Forces Command" into the "multi-national coalition body" in line with its new defense strategy.
					
					 The Bangladeshi Group for the Study of Songun Politics said in a statement that the dismantlement of the "UN Forces Command" is an essential requirement for protecting peace and stability in the Asia-Pacific region including the Korean Peninsula.
					
					 The president of the Supreme Council of the Socialist Party of Romania said the U.S. should remove the "UN Forces Command" in south Korea without delay and unconditionally withdraw its aggression forces including nukes from south Korea.
					
					 The Nepalese Committee for Promotion of Reunification of Korea strongly urged the U.S. to opt for a dialogue with the DPRK.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un recorre Fabrica 11 de Febrero de Complejo de Maquinaria de Ryongsong
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un recorre Fabrica 11 de Febrero de Complejo de Maquinaria de Ryongsong
Pyongyang, 29 de junio (ACNC) -- El Mariscal Kim Jong Un, Primer Secretario del Partido del Trabajo de Corea, Primer Presidente del Comite de Defensa Nacional de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea y Comandante Supremo del Ejercito Popular de Corea, dirigio en el terreno la Fabrica 11 de Febrero del Complejo de Maquinaria de Ryongsong.
					El fue acompanado en esta ocasion por Pak Thae Song, Hwang Pyong So, Hong Yong Chil y Yun Tong Hyon.
					
					Primero, estuvo en la sala de educacion de la historia revolucionaria.
					
					Viendo atentamente los objetos y datos expuestos alli, el Mariscal recordo con emocion la orgullosa trayectoria de la fabrica.
					
					En su recorrido por varios puntos de la fabrica, incluyendo los talleres de elaboracion, tratamiento termico y montaje, se entero en detalles del estado de modernizacion de equipos y de produccion.
					
					En el taller de elaboracion, averiguo como se usan los equipos anejados.
					
					Se mostro muy satisfecho de que en acato a las instrucciones dadas en el terreno por el Dirigente Kim Jong Il, los obreros y tecnicos de la fabrica hayan mejorado las especificaciones de equipos existentes al aplicar tecnologias avanzadas como pantalla digitalizada como parte de modernizacion.
					
					Dijo que en los ultimos anos, la fabrica logro muchos exitos al presentar meta elevada y acelerar la modernizacion de equipos y agrego que le gusta mucho la modernizacion de equipos viejos con pocos gastos.
					
					Instruyo que otras unidades deben aprender el ejemplo de esta fabrica cuando impulsen la modernizacion de equipos existentes.
					
					El Mariscal hizo conocimiento de las especificaciones tecnicas y eficacia economica de una maquina CNC hecha por cuenta propia, elogio la fabricacion de maquinas eficientes y su uso en la produccion y vio el estado de funcionamiento de los equipos CNC nuevamente instalados.
					
					En el taller de tratamiento termico, alabo el hecho de que los obreros de la fabrica libran dinamicamente el movimiento de innovacion tecnica para la modernizacion del proceso de tratamiento termico y aseguran la calidad de este proceso rebajando su costo.
					
					Cuando estuvo en el taller de montaje, vio modernas maquinas recien fabricadas y volvio a apreciar los exitos de produccion y los cientifico-tecnicos alcanzados por los obreros de la fabrica.
					
					Resalto que ahora varias ramas demandan mayor cantidad de maquinas y apunto hay que tomar estrictas medidas de suministro de materiales para la plena operacion.
					
					Para cumplir incondicionalmente el plan de produccion, es necesario organizar bien la produccion, dar mas acicate a la modernizacion y cientifizacion del proceso de produccion y elevar constantemente el nivel tecnico de los productores.
					
					Acto seguido, el Mariscal paso revista al comedor, deposito diario, campo de elaboracion de soya, etc., prestando profunda atencion a las condiciones de vida de los obreros.
					
					Tomo una foto de recuerdo con los empleados de la fabrica expresando la esperanza de que ellos contribuiran al desarrollo de la maquinaria del pais logrando mayores exitos en la produccion.

articles.title: Comandancia de Frente Occidental de EPC advierte a banda de Park Geun-hye
articles.content:
Comandancia de Frente Occidental de EPC advierte a banda de Park Geun-hye
						
Pyongyang, 29 de junio (ACNC) -- La Comandancia del Frente Occidental del Ejercito Popular de Corea hizo publica el dia 29 una informacion como sigue:
					Las actuales autoridades titeres del Sur de Corea intentan lanzar el dia 29 los volantes contra la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea en el Pabellon Rimjin enclavado en la ciudad Phaju de la provincia de Kyonggi de la parte occidental del frente al movilizar las escorias humanas adscritas a la "Federacion de Movimiento por el Norte Libre", entidad compuesta con los recalcitrantes fugitivos del Norte.
					
					El representante de la federacion hablo abiertamente de que lanzaran, segun el plan, mas de 200 mil volantes que denigran nuestra dignidad, regimen y "estado de DDHH".
					
					Segun trascendidos, en las presentas maniobras participara hasta la morralla del "Fondo Internacional de DDHH" con su sede en Estados Unidos.
					
					El hecho demuestra que las actuales autoridades surcoreanas empiezan a  enfrascarse en la confrontacion anti-RPDC en contubernio con su amo norteamericano.
					
					En los ultimos dias, la banda de Park Geun-hye frustro de modo intencional las conversaciones entre autoridades N-S preparada dificilmente y dieron a la publicidad la nota de dialogo de la Cumbre Norte-Sur, llevando asi las relaciones intercoreanas a la fase catastrofica, mientras recurren a la nueva provocacion para amenazar y chantajear a la RPDC al introducir en el Sur de Corea los armamentos belicos inclusive la escuadrilla de bombarderos estrategicos B-52.
					
					Forma parte de tal acto provocador el plan de lanzamiento de volantes desde el Pabellon Rimjin que resulta una premeditada campana conflictiva anti-RPDC. 
					
					EE.UU. y las actuales autoridades titeres surcoreanas no deben olvidar que ese pabellon esta al alcance de fuego a punteria directa de las unidades adscritas a la Comandancia del Frente Occidental del Ejercito Popular de Corea. 
					
					En varias ocasiones, incluyendo la declaracion especial fechada 19 del Ministerio de Seguridad del Pueblo de la RPDC, ya hemos advertido a los connotados fugitivos norcoreanos y a EE.UU. y la banda de Park Geun-hye que arman la campana de enfrentamiento con la RPDC movilizando hasta a esa chusma.
					
					Puesto que esas escorias humanas se ofrecen como blancos mortales de nuestros fusiles decididos a tomar la medida de castigo fisico, exponemos nuestra posicion de demostrar con acciones como se acaba el destino de los provocadores.
					
					En caso de que se torne fea la situacion actual debido al lanzamiento de volantes, todas las responsabilidades recaeran sobre EE.UU. y la banda de Park Geun-hye que lanzaron a las escorias humanas al acto provocador.

articles.title: Kim Yong Nam felicita al presidente sudanes
articles.content:
Kim Yong Nam felicita al presidente sudanes
						
Pyongyang, 29 de junio (ACNC) -- El presidente del Presidium de la Asamblea Popular Suprema de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, Kim Yong Nam, envio el dia 29 un mensaje de felicitacion al presidente de la Republica del Sudan, Omar Hassan Ahmed al-Bashir, con motivo del 24o aniversario de la revolucion sudanesa.
					El remitente desea de todo corazon al destinatario y a su pueblo mayores exitos en sus labores para la estabilidad y desarrollo del pais y expresa la conviccion de que las relaciones de amistad y cooperacion entre los dos paises se fortaleceran y se desarrollaran mas en el futuro.

articles.title: Pak Pong Ju recorre varios sectores de provincia de Phyong-an del Norte
articles.content:
Pak Pong Ju recorre varios sectores de provincia de Phyong-an del Norte 
						
Pyongyang, 29 de junio (ACNC) -- El premier de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, Pak Pong Ju, averiguo en terreno las labores de varios sectores de la provincia de Phyong-an del Norte.
					Al recorrer varios procesos de la produccion de la Fabrica Quimica de Ponghwa y la Fabrica de Cojinetes de Ryangchaek, Pak se entero del estado de equipos tecnicos y estimulo a los obreros de estas fabricas que hacen bien la administracion de equipos y la tecnica.
					
					En la Granja Cooperativa de Naejung del distrito de Yomju se cercioro del caracter tecnico de nueva trilladora movil y departio con los granjeros para analizar los asuntos que se presentan en la aplicacion del sistema de encargado de parcelas.
					
					En las unidades correspondientes se realizaron las reuniones consultivas de los funcionarios interesados, ocasiones en las cuales se discutieron las medidas para garantizar a tiempo los combustibles y materiales necesarios a la produccion y mejorar la calidad de productos.
					
					Ademas, se tomaron las medidas para intensificar el coeficiente de aprovechamiento de tierra conforme a la condicion concerniente y elevar las ganas de produccion de los trabajadores agricolas.
					
					Con anterioridad, el premier se entero en detalles del estado de produccion electrica del Complejo Termoelectrico de Pyongyang y sostuvo la reunion consultiva.
					
					En la reunion se abordaron los asuntos de enviar mas la electricidad a varios sectores de la economia nacional segun la demanda de la construccion de la potencia economica y ampliar los exitos de produccion introduciendo la nueva tecnologia a base de la ciencia y la tecnica.

articles.title: Clausurado concierto de Orquesta Unhasu por 25 de junio
articles.content:
Clausurado concierto de Orquesta Unhasu por 25 de junio
						
Pyongyang, 29 de junio (ACNC) -- Se clausuro el dia 29 el concierto de la Orquesta Unhasu que se habia inaugurado en el Teatro del Pueblo con motivo del 25 de junio, dia de la lucha antiyanqui.
					  Los jovenes, estudiantes y trabajadores presenciaron la funcion de clausura.
					
					  Los ejecutantes pusieron en la escena el solo y pangchang femeninos "Vuela alto, paloma", el cuarteto mixto "Cancion de nueva primavera", el coro mixto "Cancion de proclamacion de la Republica Popular", "Marcha de Corea" y otras piezas y musicas instrumentales.
					
					  Se ejecuto la musica visual "Complot de guerra del imperialismo norteamericano" que denuncia los crimenes cometidos por los yanquis que desataron en este territorio pacifico la guerra agresiva.
					
					  El coro mixto "Cancion de la defensa de la patria", la musica orquestal "Paso de montana Mungyong", etc. demostraron que bajo la sabia direccion del Generalisimo Kim Il Sung, los valientes soldados del Ejercito Popular de Corea y otros habitantes defendieron la tierra patria y exaltaron con dinamismo la dignidad e impetu de la nacion poniendo de manifiesto el heroismo masivo y el espiritu de sacrificio sin par.
					
					  La narracion y musica orquestal "Nucleo y paz" llevo al climax el concierto
					
					  Los espectadores redoblaron viendo el concierto la conviccion de que si venga el tiempo del combate decisivo contra los imperialistas yanquis, el ejercito y el pueblo de la RPDC, unidos en torno al Mariscal Kim Jong Un, aniquilaran implacablemente a los enemigos y lograran sin falta el evento historico de la reunificacion de la patria.
